metadata.title: CVE-2023-52797 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drivers: perf: Check find_first_bit() return value We must check the returnvalue of find_first_bit() before using the return value as an index arraysince it happens to overflow the array and then panic: [ 107.318430] KernelBUG [#1] [ 107.319434] CPU: 3 PID: 1238 Comm: kill Tainted: G E6.6.0-rc6ubuntu-defconfig #2 [ 107.319465]
